forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 52F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 5C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with rain ending in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
